title: New: Sal Dulu – Duluoz Dream
body:
This debut track from Irish hip-hop producer **Sal Dulu** is super chilled.

Merging jazz and ambient influences, _Duluoz Dream_ has a real Dilla or Pete Rock vibe to it at points. With a track set to be released once a month for the next few months, culminating in a release of a debut EP, I’m fascinated to hear what else Sal Dulu has up their sleeve.
